scripts.convert-postman-k6: npm run prepare && postman-to-k6 k6/marvel.postman.json -o k6/marvel.k6.js
scripts.convert-postman-k6-extra: npm run prepare && postman-to-k6 k6/marvel.postman.json --cli-options-file config/k6-cli-config.json
scripts.run-k6: k6 run k6/marvel.k6.js && npm run generate-report && npm run open-report
